messages.messageBody:
Earning an income article
 
Sent: Tuesday, April 03, 2001 1:34 PM
Subject: Kansas City Star news article inspiration

Cheryl Gochnauer, editor of Homebodies (http://www.homebodies.org)
and  Homebodies "Stay-at-Home Dads" columnist, Eric Lapp,
were featured in The Kansas City Star on Sunday, April 1 in an article about
living on one income.  Read it online:
http://www.kcstar.com/item/pages/moneywise.pat,business/37753c42.327,.html  
or just
Click here: Couples find that living on one income can reduce stress, expenses


This news article is worthy of being printed out and given to any of your
friends that need inspiration or help in deciding to be a SAH mom or dad.

Marlene

     "The world is so empty if one thinks only of mountains, rivers, and
cities; but to know someone here and there who thinks and feels with us, and
who, though distant, is close to us in spirit, this makes the earth an
inhabited  garden."      Goethe

"Let the different faiths exist, let them flourish, and let the glory of God
be sung in all the languages and a variety of tunes. That should be the
ideal. Respect the differences between the faiths and recognize them as valid
as long as they do not extinguish the flame of unity."    Sathya Sai Baba
